TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtocolImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供各种通信协议通用的功能，以用于为 Web 服务生成类。

span.span: Provides common functionality across communication protocols for generating classes for Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象 类及其具体派生类根据指定的通信协议生成客户端代理代码或抽象服务器代码。The abstract class and its concrete derived classes generate client proxy code or abstract server code according to a specified communication protocol. 提供通用功能，而不考虑协议。 provides common functionality regardless of the protocol. 在给定的协议中，具体派生类为 Web 服务描述语言（WSDL）文档中定义的每个受支持的绑定生成类。Within a given protocol, a concrete derived class generates a class for each supported binding defined in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 通常，开发人员无需直接调用派生自的类，而是 通过类间接使用这些类 。Typically, instead of directly invoking classes derived from , a developer uses these classes indirectly through the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The abstract XML schemas used by the associated instance

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddExtensionWarningComments(class System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection comments, class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection extensions) cil managed
Public Sub AddExtensionWarningComments (comments As CodeCommentStatementCollection, extensions As ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection)

param.name: comments
param.span: ，指定要将每个警告消息添加到的代码注释集合。

span.span: A that specifies the collection of code comments to which each warning message is added.

param.name: extensions
param.span: ，指定如果未被处理则应为其生成警告的扩展或 XML 元素。

span.span: A that specifies the extensions or XML elements for which warnings should be generated if they are not handled.

summary.span: 对于输入扩展集合中的每个未处理的扩展或 XML 元素，打开 或 警告。

span.span: For each unhandled extension or XML element in the input extensions collection, turns on a or warning for each unhandled extension or XML element in the input extensions collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法还将警告消息添加到代码注释的集合。This method also adds the warning messages to a collection of code comments.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration BeginClass() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function BeginClass () As CodeTypeDeclaration

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，初始化绑定类的生成。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the generation of a binding class.
The generated class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为给定绑定生成类时， 类 会在生成与操作相对应的方法之前调用方法。When generating a class for a given binding, the class calls the method before generating methods that correspond to operations.

abstract member BeginNamespace : unit -> unit override this.BeginNamespace : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，在代码生成过程中执行命名空间范围内的初始化。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs namespace-wide initialization during code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成代码时， 类 会在生成表示绑定的类之前调用方法。When generating code, the class calls the method before generating classes that represent bindings.

returns.span: 如果支持绑定，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the binding is supported; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成代码时， 类会调用 方法来确定是否为当前绑定生成类（由属性表示） 。When generating code, the class calls the method to determine whether to generate a class for the current binding, as represented by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsOperationFlowSupported(valuetype System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFlow flow) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function IsOperationFlowSupported (flow As OperationFlow) As Boolean

param.name: flow
param.span: 表示传输模式的 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value that represents a transmission pattern.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，确定当前操作的操作流是否受支持。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the current operation's operation flow is supported.

returns.span: 如果当前操作的操作流受支持，则为 。

span.span: if the current operation's operation flow is supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成代码时， 类会调用 方法来确定是否为当前操作生成方法（由属性表示） 。When generating code, the class calls the method to determine whether to generate a method for the current operation, as represented by the property. 对于正在为其生成类的绑定中的每个操作，都将发生此计算。This evaluation takes place for each operation in a binding for which a class is being generated. 如果 `false` 返回值，则类将 调用其 方法。If a `false` value is returned, the class calls its method. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 属性为 类型。The property is of type .
